MS MCQs

    Use Power Automate with Business Central

    »

    1. If you are using Business Central as a trigger or an action in your flow, you need to select the Environment name. What environments can you select?

      Production company and Staging company

      Production, Test, and Sandbox

      Production, Stage, Test, and Sandbox

      Production and Sandbox


    2. Every flow has two main parts, a trigger, and one or more actions. Which of the following best describes an action?

      Actions are what you want to happen when a trigger is invoked.

      Actions will trigger the frequency of the flow reoccurrence.

      Triggers are what you want to happen when an action is invoked.

      Flow actions trigger the flow to occur as long as the defined value of the trigger is met.


    3. When you want to use Business Central actions in your flow, which set of actions are available for Business Central?

      Create record, Delete record, List records, Execute action

      Create record, Delete record, Get record, Execute action

      Create record, Delete record, Update record, List records

      Create record, Delete record, Change record, Run action


    4. Business Central has embedded Power Automate flows for entities and documents approvals. Where in Business Central can you run an embedded approval flow?

      Customer Card, Vendor Card and Contact Card.

      Sales Order, Sales Shipment and Posted Sales Invoice.

      Customer Card, Sales Quote and Purchase Quote.

      Item Card, Sales Order and Purchase Order.
